vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Benjamin living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.8.17;
son of: Elpaal (H0508);
brother of: Eber (H5677I), Misham (H4936), Shemed (H8106B), Beriah (H1283I), Shema (H8087I), Zebadiah (H2069H), Meshullam (H4918J), Heber (H2268J), Ishmerai (H3461), Izliah (H3152) and Jobab (H3103K)
§ Hezeki = "strong"
a Benjamite, descendant of Shaaraim
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Elpáal; jefe de familia; tribu de Benjamín
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
希西基 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "強壯"
一名便雅憫人, 沙哈連的後代 (代上 8:17)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
希西基 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "强壮"
一名便雅悯人, 沙哈连的后代 (代上 8:17)
